item.title: Projects
item.description: Jam App Repo: https://gitlab.com/mjkochell/jam-app A music application used to make playing music and improvising with others easier. It allows users to build progressions on the fly and distribute them among other members’ devices to visually show the structure of what is to come. It uses midi information to dictate actions in the program, and to control other midi instruments. The user dynamically decides when specific notes should be sustained, when they should be let go, and when to switch to another chord.
